items.title: Can this nasal spray slow down Alzheimer's? One couple is helping scientists find out
items.description: Joe Walsh is the first Alzheimer's patient to be treated with an experimental nasal spray designed to reduce inflammation in the brain.

items.title: Trump administration's vaccines announcements have many health experts alarmed
items.description: Public health experts worry the flurry of steps by the Trump administration about vaccines is undermining public access and confidence in vaccines.
